resources.string: This is a key part of %1$s.\nPlease keep it in a secure place and do not reveal it to others.
Hints:\n • Do not scan this QR-Code.\n • Keep this paper secret.

Hints:
 • This QR-Code represents an encrypted backup.
 • Store multiple copies of this paper at different places.
 • If one paper is lost, you can use another copy.
To restore this backup:\n • Select an item in the \"BACKUPS\" section of the app.\n • Scan the QR-Code of this paper.

Hello %1$s,
I am sending you a key part. Please save this email and do not show it to others.

Yours,
%2$s
This is an encrypted backup. Please print the attached file and delete this email.
